abstract: This week’s Tech Talk podcast includes Jenna Wortham on alternatives to Facebook and robots in the operating room.
snippet: This week’s Tech Talk podcast includes Jenna Wortham on alternatives to Facebook and robots in the operating room.
lead_paragraph: In this week’s New York Times Tech Talk podcast, Bettina Edelstein finds out about some fledgling alternatives to Facebook from Jenna Wortham, a Times technology reporter who covers digital culture and the Web. These social networking upstarts have emerged at a time of widespread concern over the privacy policies of Facebook, and Ms. Wortham says their creators see a potential opportunity, offering different ways of sharing information.
